text: @Yamiche “I’d love it if Donald would get on TV take an injection of Clorox & let’s see if his theory works. Hold a big rally, say f—k this coronavirus w/all of his followers & let them hug each other, kiss each other, have a big rally, all take disinfectant & all drop dead.”~Howard Stern
